name: Polar Bear in a Snowstorm
description:
This game requires you to use your mouse, a text parser and your arrow keys. You may want to bring a friend along.

Your goal is to guide Agent Natalie through a snowstorm and collect lost items that are vital to national security. Unfortunately you can't see her in all the snow. And things just keep going wrong from there.

Created for the Extra Credits Jam 5 with the following challenges:

  • Extra Media
  • Extra CGA
  • Extra Hand
  • Extra Voice
  • Extra Diegetic UI
  • Extra Zoey
